name: Tecnogenie
tagline: You have a great idea, we have a great team
description:
Tecnogenie is a platform to find the most verified teams that aren’t restricted by commutes or a particular geographic area. Find the most qualified teams and individuals in the most unexpected places. With our highly vetted IT managers and teams combined with the right management techniques, Now, go easy without any IT headaches. 
Focus on Customer needs: 
We strive to meet our customer’s satisfaction & earn trust. We understand that our success is tied with the success of our customers. Incorporating latest technology, we deliver high quality solutions ensuring fast turn-around.
Company specialities:- 
Website Design & Development, (WordPress, PHP, Cake-PHP, Magento, Ruby on Rails, ASP.Net) 
Mobile Applications Development, (Android, iPhone, iPad, Windows) 
Sybase Database Management 
SAP
